item.title: Kinda Solved the hole in mouth
item.dc:creator: @xdarklight.x xdarklight.x
item.description:
@xdarklight.x wrote:

k notice the girls don have a hole in thier mouths but guys do i dont know withc one is with on the player.java thing in this code
Picture to prove it

[code]if (playerEquipment[server.client.playerHat] > 1) {
playerProps.writeWord(0x200 + playerEquipment[server.client.playerHat]);
} else {
playerProps.writeByte(0);
}
if (playerEquipment[server.client.playerCape] > 1) {
playerProps.writeWord(0x200 + playerEquipment[server.client.playerCape]);
} else {
playerProps.writeByte(0);
}
if (playerEquipment[server.client.playerAmulet] > 1) {
playerProps.writeWord(0x200 + playerEquipment[server.client.playerAmulet]);
} else {
playerProps.writeByte(0);
}
if (playerEquipment[server.client.playerWeapon] > 1 && !IsWcing) {
playerProps.writeWord(0x200 + playerEquipment[server.client.playerWeapon]);
} else if (playerAxe > 0 && IsWcing) {
playerProps.writeWord(0x200 + playerAxe);
} else {
playerProps.writeByte(0);
}
if (playerEquipment[server.client.playerChest] > 1) {
playerProps.writeWord(0x200 + playerEquipment[server.client.playerChest]);
} else {
playerProps.writeWord(0x100+pTorso);
}
if (playerEquipment[server.client.playerShield] > 1 && !IsWcing) {
playerProps.writeWord(0x200 + playerEquipment[server.client.playerShield]);
} else {
playerProps.writeByte(0);
}
if (!Item.isPlate(playerEquipment[server.client.playerChest])) {
playerProps.writeWord(0x100+pArms);
} else {
playerProps.writeByte(0);
}
if (playerEquipment[server.client.playerLegs] > 1) {
playerProps.writeWord(0x200 + playerEquipment[server.client.playerLegs]);
} else {
playerProps.writeWord(0x100+pLegs);
}
if (!Item.isFullHelm(playerEquipment[server.client.playerHat]) && !Item.isFullMask(playerEquipment[server.client.playerHat])) {
playerProps.writeWord(0x100 + pHead); // head
} else {
playerProps.writeByte(0);
}
if (playerEquipment[server.client.playerHands] > 1) {
playerProps.writeWord(0x200 + playerEquipment[server.client.playerHands]);
} else {
playerProps.writeWord(0x100+pHands);
}
if (playerEquipment[server.client.playerFeet] > 1) {
playerProps.writeWord(0x200 + playerEquipment[server.client.playerFeet]);
} else {
playerProps.writeWord(0x100+pFeet);
}
if (!Item.isFullHelm(playerEquipment[server.client.playerHat]) && !Item.isFullMask(playerEquipment[server.client.playerHat]) &&(playerLook[0] != 1)) {
playerProps.writeWord(0x100 + pBeard); // Beard
} else {
playerProps.writeByte(0);
}

  //playerProps.writeByte(0);[/code]

I hope someone understood me

Read full topic
